ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, DIGIC 5 Image Processor, ISO 100-12800; expandable to 25600 (H)
Hybrid CMOS AF and Multi Shot Noise Reduction
EOS Full HD Movie mode with Movie Servo AF for continuous focus tracking of moving subjects
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S lenses (Optional EF Lens Adapter is required)
Compatibility with SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards, including new Ultra High Speed (UHS-I) cards (Card Included in Package)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS-M Mirrorless Digital Camera with EF-M 22mm f/2 STM Lens - Black + 8 GB Kit - Includes: Canon EOS-M Mirrorless Digital Camera with EF-M 22mm f/2 STM Lens - Black (Camera and Accessories and USA warranty), + Vidpro DC-10 Camera and Lens Case, Extra LP-E12 Rechargable Battery, Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Card, Card Reader, Memory Card Wallet, Digital Camera Cleaning Kit
